## R packages üì¶

<br>

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| include: true
#| echo: true
# Load usethis
library(usethis)
# run check
use_github_action("check-standard")
# build pkgdown site
use_github_action("pkgdown")
```

<br>

See other examples in: [github.com/r-lib/actions/](https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v2/examples)

## What can we do with GHA? {.wow .center}

-   Run arbitrary R scripts:

    -   Scrape data from the internet

    -   Run reports with RMarkdown or Quarto

    -   Send emails

    -   Save results
